data.title: Examples of "Clint" in a Sentence
data.meta_description: Learn how to use "clint" in a sentence with 40 example sentences on YourDictionary.
data.text:
Does the smell of garbage make you feel nauseous or nauseated? These words seem interchangeable, but they actually have different usages and meanings. Find out which one describes that sick feeling in your stomach.

When you scramble a word to create a new word, you've created an anagram. For example, you can turn the word anagram into ragman, ma rang or nag a ram! Anagram examples can be fun and witty, and they often end in hilarious results.
